
                            
                            <p>4月底刚刚买了mini3，那时候国补2029，比平时已经便宜了。昨天国补后又便宜了。从淘金币搜索可以抵扣5、60，国补后只需要1800<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/13/084301opm7oh3bx3u7h5i5.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/13/084301opm7oh3bx3u7h5i5.png">	    	     <br> </p><p class="pl">地区玩不了 买了也是吃灰 哎<br>几年前就想买个几千块钱的大疆</p>
